title: Brainfreeze

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything, they gain an Ice Mark, and you learn their name.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Force a player with an Ice Mark to target themselves each night.
**Nevermelt** â€” Choose up to two players. Their defense is set to None tonight and they can't have defense tonight. Then, force them to target themselves. You may only use this ability once each game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all who don't submit to the endless winter.

desc:
Post 849
*Colder, colder, yet colder.*
Roleblock immune
